Hi all,

I'm quite new to this heritrix.
Could u plz help me for specified =
problem?

Consider, i have crawled one website and i got its web pages,
if =
we take the case - crawled website removed one page(abc.html).
After this, =
if i crawl this site again, then obviously removed page(abc.html) would not=
 come by crawler, but my question is whether heritrix would somehow indicat=
e us that this page(abc.html) was tried to fetch but it's been removed from=
 website.

Is it possible in heritrix, if yes then plz provide "settings" o=
ption to achieve this.

Thanking you.

Regards,
Tarun
